SignInUpPage.EnterYourInformation: Enter your information below to create your account
SignInUpPage.EnterYourEmailToSignIn: Enter your email to sign in to your account
SignInUpPage.ClickConsent: By clicking continue, you agree to our

RequestPasswordResetPage.EnterYourEmail: Enter your email to receive a link to reset your password

PasswordResetEmailSentPage.PasswordResetInstructions1: If this email address is associated with an account, you will receive a password reset link shortly. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password.
PasswordResetEmailSentPage.PasswordResetInstructions2: If you don’t see the email, please check your spam folder.
PasswordResetEmailSentPage.PasswordResetInstructions3: If you didn’t request a password reset, you can ignore this email.

Event.MyEventsDescription: Overview of all events you have created
Event.NoCompetitorsFound: No competitors found for the selected class.

Operations.CreateDescription: Fill out the form to create a new event

Live.Title: Live Feed
Live.Description: Real-time updates will appear here during the event

Alert.DemoDescription: OrienteerFeed app is a demo app. If you face an issue please report it to Github issues, thanks.
Alert.EventDataNotAvailableMessage: No data is currently available for the {{view}} view. Please check back later or contact the event organizer for more information.

Report.Title: Changelog report
Report.Description: Overview of status and card changes
Report.CompetitorChangesDescription: All changes for the selected competitor in this event.
Report.CompetitorChangesEmpty: No changes found for this competitor.

Alert.UnpublishedDescription: This event is currently in draft mode and not visible to the public.

Card.Title: Event Information
Card.Description: Please fill out the form below to update the event details

Card.Title: Event Password
Card.Description: Enter event password that secures event details requested via API

Toast.UpdateFailTitle: Something went wrong, please try again.
Toast.RevokeFailTitle: Something went wrong, please try again.

Card.Title: Event link
Card.Description: Use this feature to quickly share a link to an event - you can copy, share or print the QR code for easy access to live results.

Navigator.Title: OrienteerFeed
Navigator.UrlDescription: Scan the QR code to access live results instantly!

PrintWindow.Title: QR Code - OrienteerFeed Live Results
PrintWindow.Info: Scan this QR code to view live results online.

Toast.CopySuccessDescription: Boom! The link is now in your clipboard, share it away!

Card.Title: O Checklist connection
Card.Description: Scan the QR code to set url, event id and password into the settings of O Feed connection. Click on the QR code icon in the settings in the app to launch the camera.

Navigator.Title: OrienteerFeed QR Code
Navigator.Text: Here is the QR code for the O-Feed event to pair your mobile app O-Checklist!

PrintWindow.Subheader: Scan this QR code to pair your mobile app O-Checklist with the event.
PrintWindow.Footer: Please keep this information secure. If you encounter any issues, contact support.

Card.Title: Visibility
Card.Description: Determines whether the event is public or private. Public events are displayed in the event list on the application's main page, while private events are visible only to their organizer.

DangerZone.Title: Danger Zone
DangerZone.Description: Irreversible actions that will permanently delete data. Proceed with extreme caution.
DangerZone.Footer: These actions cannot be undone. Please ensure you have appropriate backups.

DeleteCompetitors.Title: Delete competitors
DeleteCompetitors.Description: If you uploaded Start list or Results for a wrong event, you can delete all competitors and start over. This button deletes all runners (Start list & Results).
DeleteCompetitors.ConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete all competitors? This action cannot be undone.

DeleteAllEventData.Title: Delete all event data
DeleteAllEventData.Description: If you need to completely remove all event data, including runners, classes, and results, use this button. Be cautious, as this action            is irreversible.
DeleteAllEventData.ConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete all event data? This will remove all results and cannot be undone.

DeleteEvent.Title: Delete event
DeleteEvent.Description: All event data will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
DeleteEvent.ConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this entire event? This action cannot be undone.

TroublesShooting.Title: Need Help or Have Questions?
TroublesShooting.Description: If you encounter an error or need assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
TroublesShooting.Description1: Our support team is ready to assist you with any issues or questions. Reach out to us at

Hero.Subtitle: Live orienteering results and event hub. Sync races, track athletes, and explore full data in one place.

Infinite.NoEventsHint: Try changing the filter or check back later.

MyEntries.Title: My entries
MyEntries.Description: Here you can find all your entries and changes made to event registrations. You can view them, edit them, or track their status.

PersonalInfo.Title: Personal info
PersonalInfo.Description: Here you can view and update your personal details, contact information, and other profile settings.

OAuth2.Title: OAuth2 API Access
OAuth2.Description: Generate credentials to access the API using OAuth2. You will need a Client ID and a Client Secret.
OAuth2.SecretWarningDescription: Your Client Secret is sensitive information. Do not share it with anyone and store it securely. It will not be shown again after you leave or refresh this page.

Toast.GenerateSuccessDescription: OAuth2 credentials have been successfully generated!
Toast.GenerateFailTitle: Something went wrong, please try again.

HowToUse.Title: How to use OAuth2
HowToUse.Description: Use your Client ID and Client Secret in a request with grant_type=client_credentials to the /auth/oauth2/token endpoint. Below is an example request using curl.

OtherIntegrations.Title: Other integrations
OtherIntegrations.Description: Connect your account with additional services and tools. New integrations will appear here over time.

Security.PasswordDescription: Here you can change your account password. We recommend using a strong, unique password.

UploadIofXml.Title: Upload IOF XML
UploadIofXml.Description: Upload IOF XML files with start lists and results

Toast.UploadFail: Something went wrong during the file upload. Please try again.

Error.DescriptionSingle: Only {{count}} file can be uploaded at a time
Error.DescriptionPlural: Only {{count}} files can be uploaded at a time

EventSearchDialog.Title: Search events
EventSearchDialog.Placeholder: Search by name, location, country, or organizer...
EventSearchDialog.Hint: Try searching by: event name, city, country, or organizer
EventSearchDialog.NoEventsHint: Try searching by event name, location, country, or organizer
EventSearchDialog.StartTypingHint: Search by event name, location, country, or organizer

Validations.EmailsContainNotEmail: One of the entered emails is not valid
Validations.EmailsUnique: The email addresses entered must be unique
Validations.EmailsMinMax: The number of emails must be a minimum of {{min}} and a maximum of {{max}}
Validations.RegistrationNumber: The registration number must correspond to the valid CSOS format (e.g. XXX0101)
Validations.Number: The entered value must be a number
Validations.Time: The time must be entered in the format HH:MM:SS (e.g. 01:18:06)
Validations.TimeInZones: The time in the zones must not be longer than the total activity time
